messages.content: Can I cancel the booking of 4PM I did just now
Could not determine which day to cancel. Please specify the day.
I cancel the booking of 4PM I did just now
Could not determine which day to cancel. Please specify the day.
Please cancel the booking for 4PM Wed

Here is a friendly response for a hotel booking cancellation:

"Hi there, 

We're happy to confirm that your booking (PR) has been successfully cancelled as of Wednesday at 16:00. You're all set! If you need to make any new arrangements or have any questions, feel free to reach out to us. 

Best, [Your Hotel Name] Team"
